history.proof: intros A B C f g1 g2 dom1 dom2 m1 m2 x. split. - intros H. split. + apply find_None. hfcrush use: S.Dom.union_spec, find_None unfold: S.Dom.elt, S.key. + apply find_None. hfcrush use: S.Dom.union_spec, find_None unfold: S.Dom.elt, S.key. - intros [H1 H2]. hauto lq: on use: find_None, S.Dom.union_spec unfold: S.Dom.elt, S.key.

ctx: intros A B C f g1 g2 dom1 dom2 m1 m2 x.
intros A B C f g1 g2 dom1 dom2 m1 m2 x.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type C : Type f : A → B → C g1 : A → C g2 : B → C dom1, dom2 : Dom.t m1 : t A dom1 m2 : t B dom2 x : key H : find x (combine f g1 g2 m1 m2) = None Unable to unify "find x (combine f g1 g2 m1 m2) = None" with "¬ Dom.In x dom1".

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type C : Type f : A → B → C g1 : A → C g2 : B → C dom1, dom2 : Dom.t m1 : t A dom1 m2 : t B dom2 x : key H : find x (combine f g1 g2 m1 m2) = None Unable to unify "find x (combine f g1 g2 m1 m2) = None" with "¬ Dom.In x dom2".

ctx: intros A B C f g1 g2 dom1 dom2 m1 m2 x.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "∀ (A : Type) (x y : X.t) (dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂), X.eq x y → eq m₁ m₂ → find x m₁ = find y m₂" on hypothesis of type "find x m1 = None".

ctx: intros A B C f g1 g2 dom1 dom2 m1 m2 x.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "∀ (A : Type) (x y : X.t) (dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂), X.eq x y → eq m₁ m₂ → find x m₁ = find y m₂" on hypothesis of type "find x m2 = None".

ctx: intros A B C f g1 g2 dom1 dom2 m1 m2 x.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "find x m1" in the current goal.

ctx: intros A B C f g1 g2 dom1 dom2 m1 m2 x.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type C : Type f : A → B → C g1 : A → C g2 : B → C dom1, dom2 : Dom.t m1 : t A dom1 m2 : t B dom2 x : key H1 : find x m1 = None H2 : find x m2 = None Unable to unify "(S.find ?M1717 (S.combine ?M1710 ?M1711 ?M1712 ?M1715 ?M1716) = Some ?M1718 → (∃ (v₁ : ?M1707) (v₂ : ?M1708), S.find ?M1717 ?M1715 = Some v₁ ∧ S.find ?M1717 ?M1716 = Some v₂ ∧ ?M1718 = ?M1710 v₁ v₂) ∨ (∃ v₁ : ?M1707, S.find ?M1717 ?M1715 = Some v₁ ∧ S.find ?M1717 ?M1716 = None ∧ ?M1718 = ?M1711 v₁) ∨ (∃ v₂ : ?M1708, S.find ?M1717 ?M1715 = None ∧ S.find ?M1717 ?M1716 = Some v₂ ∧ ?M1718 = ?M1712 v₂)) ∧ ((∃ (v₁ : ?M1707) (v₂ : ?M1708), S.find ?M1717 ?M1715 = Some v₁ ∧ S.find ?M1717 ?M1716 = Some v₂ ∧ ?M1718 = ?M1710 v₁ v₂) ∨ (∃ v₁ : ?M1707, S.find ?M1717 ?M1715 = Some v₁ ∧ S.find ?M1717 ?M1716 = None ∧ ?M1718 = ?M1711 v₁) ∨ (∃ v₂ : ?M1708, S.find ?M1717 ?M1715 = None ∧ S.find ?M1717 ?M1716 = Some v₂ ∧ ?M1718 = ?M1712 v₂) → S.find ?M1717 (S.combine ?M1710 ?M1711 ?M1712 ?M1715 ?M1716) = Some ?M1718)" with "find x (combine f g1 g2 m1 m2) = None".

original: intros A B C f g1 g2 dom1 dom2 m1 m2 x. split. - intros H. split. + apply find_None. intros Hx Hin. apply H. apply findA with (x:=x) in Hin. rewrite Hx in Hin. discriminate. + apply find_None. intros Hx Hin. apply H. apply findA with (x:=x) in Hin. rewrite Hx in Hin. discriminate. - intros [H1 H2]. apply find_compat with (x:=x) (y:=x) in H1. apply find_compat with (x:=x) (y:=x) in H2. rewrite H1, H2. apply S.combine_spec.
